text:
Fruit of the Earth Aloe Vera Gel, NYC New York Color Liquid Eyeliner, and L'Oréal Paris True Match Super-Blendable Makeup

"You cannot let me into a Target or a Rite Aid because I'll be in there for hours," she says. These are a few of her favorites.

Fruit of the Earth Aloe Vera Gel, $10.59 (amazon.com).

NYC New York Color Liquid Eyeliner, $2.82 (walmart.com).

L'Oréal Paris True Match Super-Blendable Makeup, $6.85 (amazon.com).
title: 23 Drugstore Products Celebrities Use Every Day

meta_data.author: Renee Jacques
meta_data.description: 17 celebs and the drugstore beauty picks they swear by (and no, they're not getting paid just to say it).

og.description: Celebrities live privileged lives, complete with expensive perks and major freebies, right? Sure, but they're also real people who still like to pop into a CVS every once in a while (or, you know, send their assistant) to scoop up a cheap moisturizer or inexpensive mascara. Ahead, 17 celebs and the drugstore beauty picks they swear by (and no, they're not getting paid just to say it).
og.title: 23 Drugstore Products Celebrities Use Every Day
